questions.question: Which of the following will have the highest time period of oscillation?

explanations.d: Time period depends upon the reduced mass of the atoms involved in the vibrational mode. Higher the reduced mass, higher is the time period. C-Cl has the highest reduced mass among all.

questions.question: Which of the following will have the slowest time period of oscillation?

answers.d: All will have the same time period

explanations.c: Time period of an oscillation depends on the force constant of the bond involved. Force constant is higher for bonds having multiple bonds than those having single bonds.

questions.question: Choose the correct statement from the following

answers.a: It is not possible to reach a higher energy stationary state using geometry optimization
answers.b: It is possible to reach a higher energy stationary state using geometry optimization
answers.c: Geometry optimization can take any structure to both high and low energy stationary states

explanations.b: Geometry optimization can take a structure to high and low energy stationary state depending on the requirement of the calculations, provided the structure is closer to expected stationary state.
